author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
What's a simple way of organizing LEGOs? How did Adam's entertainment skills evolve? Any advice on being a generalist in a world where self-branding and specialization seems to be the currency? In this live stream excerpt, Adam answers these questions from Tested members Wasteland Reaper, Vickie Bligh and J Dellarosa, whom we thank for their support. 

00:00 Organizing LEGOs
00:17 Social anxiety 
06:17 Generalist vs. specialist

title: How Adam Savage's Loneliness Led to His Career

author: Adam Savage’s Tested
description:
Did you know that the 1978 Superman movie won an Academy Award for its visual effects? Adam takes a look at two special effects miniatures created for the Richard Donner classic, including Superman's radient spaceship seen in the film's opening sequence. Plus, a miniature Superman filming puppet that is literally cut from the same cloth as his iconic costume!

Learn more about these props and see more details at: https://propstoreauction.com/auctions/info/id/462

Shot by Josh Self and edited by Norman Chan
Music by Jinglepunks
